tuples.input: Despite market volatility, Costco Wholesale (COST) and Lockheed Martin (LMT) maintained stable performance throughout Q3
Healthcare stocks UnitedHealth Group (UNH) and Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) showed promising growth in emerging markets
Analysts are closely watching VMW and ADSK after recent software industry consolidation news
Semiconductor equipment maker AMAT reported earnings while KLAC and LRCX remain under pressure from export restrictions
In the biotech sector, Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN) and Vertex Pharmaceuticals (VRTX) announced breakthrough research results
